verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

צַ֞ו <S%H6680><s%> tzav Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im unto them When ye come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz into the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, (this [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that תִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> tip-Pol that shall fall לָכֶם֙ la-Chem בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lah, unto you for an inheritance אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [even] the land כְּנַ֖עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an of Canaan לִגְבֻלֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1367><s%> lig-vu-lo-Tei-ha. with the coasts

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall extend לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- quarter נֶ֛גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev Then your south מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-bar- shall be from the wilderness צִ֖ן <S%H6790><s%> tzin of Zin עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei along by the coast אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom; of Edom וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall extend לָכֶם֙ la-Chem גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul border נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev, and your south מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh shall be the outmost coast יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> yom- sea הַמֶּ֖לַח <S%H4417><s%> ham-Me-lach of the salt קֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah. eastward

וְנָסַ֣ב <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav shall turn לָכֶם֩ la-Chem הַגְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And your border מִנֶּ֜גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev from the south לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה le-ma-'a-Leh עַקְרַבִּים֙ <S%H4610><s%> 'ak-rab-Bim of Akrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'A-var and pass on צִ֔נָה <S%H6790><s%> Tzi-nah, to Zin; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become קתּֽוֹצְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H8444><s%> totz-'o-Tav, and the going forth מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev thereof shall be from the south לְקָדֵ֣שׁ le-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <S%H6947><s%> bar-Ne-a'; to Kadeshbarnea וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and shall go on חֲצַר־ cha-tzar- אַדָּ֖ר <S%H2692><s%> 'ad-Dar to Hazaraddar וְעָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and pass on עַצְמֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6111><s%> 'atz-Mo-nah. to Azmon

וְנָסַ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav shall fetch a compass הַגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border מֵעַצְמ֖וֹן <S%H6111><s%> me-'atz-Mon from Azmon נַ֣חְלָה <S%H5158><s%> Nach-lah unto the river מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> totz-'o-Tav and the goings out הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah. of it shall be at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul border יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, And [as for] the western וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall have לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol ye shall even have the great וּגְב֑וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul; for a border זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> zeh- this יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul border יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam. this shall be your west

וְזֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> ve-zeh- and this יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul border צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon; And this shall be your north מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַגָּדֹ֔ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, from the great תְּתָא֥וּ <S%H8376><s%> te-ta-'U ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem הֹ֥ר <S%H2023><s%> hor Hor הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har. for you mount

מֵהֹ֣ר <S%H2023><s%> me-Hor Hor הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, From mount תְּתָא֖וּ <S%H8376><s%> te-ta-'U ye shall point out לְבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> le-Vo [your border] unto the entrance חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat; of Hamath וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become תּוֹצְאֹ֥ת <S%H8444><s%> totz-'Ot and the goings forth הַגְּבֻ֖ל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul of the border צְדָֽדָה׃ <S%H6657><s%> tze-Da-dah. shall be to Zedad

וְיָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza shall go on הַגְּבֻל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border זִפְרֹ֔נָה <S%H2202><s%> zif-Ro-nah, to Ziphron וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> totz-'o-Tav and the goings out חֲצַ֣ר cha-Tzar עֵינָ֑ן <S%H2704><s%> 'ei-Nan; of it shall be at Hazarenan זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> zeh- This יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul border צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon. this shall be your north

וְהִתְאַוִּיתֶ֥ם <S%H184><s%> ve-hit-'av-vi-Tem And ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לִגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> lig-Vul border קֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah; your east מֵחֲצַ֥ר me-cha-Tzar עֵינָ֖ן <S%H2704><s%> 'ei-Nan from Hazarenan שְׁפָֽמָה׃ <S%H8221><s%> she-Fa-mah. to Shepham

וְיָרַ֨ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad shall go down הַגְּבֻ֧ל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the coast מִשְּׁפָ֛ם <S%H8221><s%> mish-she-Fam from Shepham הָרִבְלָ֖ה <S%H7247><s%> ha-riv-Lah to Riblah מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem on the east side לָעָ֑יִן <S%H5871><s%> la-'A-yin; of Ain וְיָרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad shall descend הַגְּב֔וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul, and the border וּמָחָ֛ה <S%H4229><s%> u-ma-Chah and shall reach עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto כֶּ֥תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef unto the side יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> yom- of the sea כִּנֶּ֖רֶת <S%H3672><s%> kin-Ne-ret of Chinnereth קֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah. eastward

וְיָרַ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad shall go down הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-De-nah, to Jordan וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> totz-'o-Tav and the goings out יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> yam sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> ham-Me-lach; of it shall be at the salt זֹאת֩ <S%H2063><s%> zoT likewise תִּהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz this shall be your land לִגְבֻלֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1367><s%> lig-vu-lo-Tei-ha with the coasts סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. thereof round about

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, This [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְנַחֲל֤וּ <S%H5157><s%> tit-na-cha-Lu which ye shall inherit אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah בְּגוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> be-go-Ral, by lot אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, which the LORD לָתֵ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <S%H8672><s%> le-tish-'At unto the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and to the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh. tribe

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לָקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu have received מַטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh For the tribe בְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> ve-Nei of the children הָראוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> ha-r-'u-ve-Ni of Reuben לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam, of their fathers וּמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mat-Teh and the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children הַגָּדִ֖י <S%H1410><s%> hag-ga-Di of Gad לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit according to the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers וַחֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi [their inheritance] and half מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לָקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam. their inheritance

שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei The two הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and the half הַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh; tribe לָקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam, their inheritance מֵעֵ֛בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> le-yar-Den Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho [near] Jericho קֵ֥דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah eastward מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah. toward the sunrising פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יִנְחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> yin-cha-Lu which shall divide לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land אֶלְעָזָר֙ <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar unto you Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> vi-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נֽוּן׃ <S%H5126><s%> Nun. of Nun

וְנָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si prince אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one נָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> na-Si leader אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one מִמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh; of every tribe תִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-Chu And ye shall take לִנְחֹ֥ל <S%H5157><s%> lin-Chol by inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the land

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot And the names הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim; of the men לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh [are] these Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh. of Jephunneh

וּלְמַטֵּה֙ <S%H4294><s%> u-le-mat-Teh And of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, of Simeon שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El Shemuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֱלִידָ֖ד <S%H449><s%> 'e-li-Dad Elidad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son כִּסְלֽוֹן׃ <S%H3692><s%> kis-Lon. of Chislon

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children דָ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> dan of Dan נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> na-Si; And the prince בֻּקִּ֖י <S%H1231><s%> buk-Ki Bukki בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יָגְלִֽי׃ <S%H3020><s%> ya-ge-Li. of Jogli
